Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: @artik123   From EFF : â€œAt one end, presentations that require the user, before clicking, to scroll to the bottom of a set of terms, or through an adjacent scroll box, guarantees the entirety of the TOS appears at least once, even if the user chooses to ignore it, and has been held to be enforceable. â€œ.  https://www.eff.org/wp/clicks-bind-ways-users-agree-online-terms-service
